column15: 2015) send sympathy gifts view/ create memorial website west lebanon
column20: 2015 at lebanon center genesis. she was born on september 13
column21: 1934 in lebanon to the late john & almeda (la. bombard) churchill and grew up a farm girl helping with the familys dairy and maple business - maple row farm. she graduated from lebanon high school (1952) and then worked at mary hitchcock memorial hospital in hanover in the insurance department for ten years. she married the love of her life thomas purcell
column23: travelled the world to various oil conventions
column24: enjoyed the company of toms parents and eating with friends and family at landers restaurant. she settled in as a home maker after the birth of her daughter christine and later in life she cared for both her parents as their health declined. she loved her dogs
column25: horses and could often be seen walking her poodle jasmine along churchill way. she enjoyed listening to upbeat irish and polka music and greatly enjoyed watching the red sox and celtic games. she is survived by her daughter christine mc. inerney and her husband brian of lebanon
column26: and several nieces and nephews. she was predeceased by her parents
column27: her brother bernard churchill and her husband tom (2003). barbara requested a small graveside service with close family and friends. should one choose memorial donations
column28: they can be made to a charity of ones choice. print back 2010 - 2015 ricker funeral home 56 school street
